s: October 18, 2024 - In 1999, David Ritz and others ... store brands to the internet. Despite the fact that the two companies share warehouse space and some personnel, Ritz Interactive and Ritz Camera Centers are officially separate companies. In 2002, Ritz Interactive acquired the Internet division of Cameraworld.com, a Portland, Oregon–based company.
